## PagePingEvent interface

A Page Ping Event Fires when activity tracking is enabled in the browser. Tracks same information as the last tracked Page View and includes scroll information from the current page view

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface PagePingEvent extends PageViewEvent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> PageViewEvent

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxXOffset?](./node-tracker.pagepingevent.maxxoffset.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum X scroll position for the current page view |
|  [maxYOffset?](./node-tracker.pagepingevent.maxyoffset.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum Y scroll position for the current page view |
|  [minXOffset?](./node-tracker.pagepingevent.minxoffset.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The minimum X scroll position for the current page view |
|  [minYOffset?](./node-tracker.pagepingevent.minyoffset.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The minimum Y scroll position for the current page view |
